participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, enthusiastic, and passionate about art and music.
participant_1.background: I'd love to share a meal with someone who shares my passion for sketching. I'm a little taller than average, but my height doesn't matter to me as long as I can find someone to share my love of Christmas with. I wish I could say that I do, but my health is more important. I like to arm wrestle. I currently hold three jobs.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing, caring, and has a unique sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I'm five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body. I was honored to be able to donate blood in honor of my late sister. My collection of raincoat-wearing toys is priceless. I play quarterback. I'm a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to?
I'm just hanging out, waiting for my favorite show to start.
It's a new show about a group of friends who are all trying to find their way in the world.
That's a great name! I love to sketch.
Me too! I'm actually a professional sketch artist.
Wow, that's amazing! I'd love to see some of your work sometime.
Sure, I'd be happy to show you.
I'm also a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.
That's cool. I love singing too.
Do you have a favorite song?
I have a lot of favorite songs, but one of my favorites is "All I Want for Christmas Is You" by Mariah Carey.
That's a great song! I love singing it too.
Do you want to sing it with me?
